questions.question: India and which of the following agreed to expand their maritime security and boost their anti-terror cooperation in order to deal with the common challenges in Indian Ocean Region?
Which of the following country conducted a test which was aimed to help the country to boost its reliable strategic nuclear deterrent at Sohae Satellite Launching site?
Who recently won the Presidential election in Algeria?
Which country has been left out of European Union's 2050 climate neutrality agreement?
Who is the foreign minister of Indonesia?
